SUMMARY
My scientific interests are wide and they are concerned with many
directions of Information Technology. In particular these are new
technology software of Microsoft.
I am interested in these areas because a lot of unsolved problems
exist at this moment, and I would like to develop my scientific
activity with aforesaid directions.
I expected to work for the production software company.
